result.title: Final report on Athens demonstration execution
result.description: These report aim to present the timeline of preparation and execution of the demonstration meetings workshops installations monitoring feedback collection etc They will contain information on the technical and business barriers to the demonstration information about access to services and APIs the collaboration and data sharing agreements information on legacy systems and other information that COHESIVE will require for a successful demonstration so they will provide inputs to the evaluation task T62 By writing the first draft of each of these reports in M20 the milestone M51 will be also reached In cooperation with COHESIVE and other IP4 projects involved in relevant demonstrations the results and conclusions of the demonstration execution will be elaborated in T51 and included in D51 too

result.title: Report on the actions of the Integration, Data and Management Committees
result.description: This is an allencompassing deliverable covering the whole spectrum of Integration Data and Management Committees actions It will be delivered in 3 main parts451 Report on the actions of the Integration Committee linked with T42 responsible partner POLIMISince committees operate on live input continuously feeding other tasks in IP4MaaS they will maintain a log of their achievements actions problems and other information that describe their operation to be used in retrospect The integration committee will specifically provide information on the integration actions executed and their progress452 Report on the actions of the Data Committee linked with T43 responsible partner FIT The data committee will specifically provide information on the data collected during the demonstrations and on the data exchanges between TSPs and CFMs453 Report on the actions of the Management Committee linked with T44 responsible partner UITPThe management committee will specifically provide information on the progress of the demonstrations as a whole and recommendations for future projects for structuring the demonstrations

result.title: Final report on Osijek demonstration execution
result.description: These report aim to present the timeline of preparation and execution of the demonstration meetings workshops installations monitoring feedback collection etc They will contain information on the technical and business barriers to the demonstration information about access to services and APIs the collaboration and data sharing agreements information on legacy systems and other information that COHESIVE will require for a successful demonstration so they will provide inputs to the evaluation task T62 By writing the first draft of each of these reports in M20 the milestone M51 will be also reached In cooperation with COHESIVE and other IP4 projects involved in relevant demonstrations the results and conclusions of the demonstration execution will be elaborated in T51 and included in D51 too
